column5: Ok so I was totally bored and I made this video of my kids. We already filmed the next 4 scenes, just thought I would share.  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CI59kEVPHDw
I see an Oscar for best actress in a supporting role for that!!! Thanks for the smile today.   Paul

Took like 10 retakes for that one scene. Its pretty funny they are so excited about it. All the neighbor kids want me to do a big finally scene with light sabers and wizards flying around haha. They think they are famous already like Justing Beiber.
